item.title: CVE-2022-21818|2024-08-03T02:53:36.254Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20license%20system
item.description: NVIDIA License System contains a vulnerability in the installation scripts for the DLS virtual appliance, where a user on a network after signing in to the portal can access other usersâ€™ credentials, allowing them to gain escalated privileges, resulting in limited impact to both confidentiality and integrity.
